fullplot: A drama set in New Mexico during WWII, centered on the relationship between a young man and an elderly medicine woman who helps him contend with the battle between good and evil that rages in his village.
plot: A drama set in New Mexico during WWII, centered on the relationship between a young man and an elderly medicine woman who helps him contend with the battle between good and evil that rages in his village.
title: Bless Me, Ultima
writers: Rudolfo Anaya (based on the novel by)
Carl Franklin (written for the screen by)
